form.describe_textarea_description: Do not type personal information in this description. We will ask this of you later in this form.
form.describe_upload_description: Add a photo to clarify the situation

errors.file_type_invalid: Invalid file type. Only JPEG, PNG, and GIF are accepted.
errors.file_size_too_large: File size too large. Each file must be less than 20MB.
errors.file_size_too_small: File size too small. Each file must be at least 30KB.

form.heading: May we call you for questions? And keep you informed via e-mail?
form.description:
Often we have another question. With this we can solve the problem faster or better. Or we want to explain something. We would then like to give you a call. Or else we e-mail you.

We only use your phone number and e-mail address for this report.
form.send_to_other_instance_description: Sometimes the municipality cannot do anything. Another organization must then get to work. If so, we can sometimes forward your report. We send your phone number or e-mail address along with it. But we only do that if you agree.
form.describe_phone_input_heading: What is your telephone number? (not required)
form.describe_mail_input_heading: What is your e-mail address? (not required)
form.describe_checkbox_input_description: Yes, I give the Municipality of Amsterdam permission to forward my report to other organizations if the report is not intended for the Municipality.

describe-summary.heading: 4. Submit
describe-summary.description: Check your information and submit your report.

step_three.title: 3. Contact information
step_three.no_contact_details: You have not entered contact information. We cannot let you know what we have done with your report.
step_three.input_sharing_allowed: Yes, I authorize the Municipality of Amsterdam to forward my report to other organizations if it is not intended for the municipality.

describe-thankyou.heading: Thank you!
describe-thankyou.description_notification_number: Your notification is registered with us.
describe-thankyou.description_notification_email: Did you provide an email address? You will receive an email with all the details of your notification.
describe-thankyou.what_do_we_do_heading: What do we do with your notification?
describe-thankyou.what_do_we_do_description: Your notification is scheduled: we will inform you within 5 working days about how and when your notification will be handled. We will do this via email.
